review: I have a Roku for Amazon prime and netflix, so I'm using Chromecast for specific applications.  I'm on vacation and have been accessing my Comcast premium channels through their xfinity app and it works perfectly.  I also can watch wildlife cams on the big screen which has been a significant improvement vs a computer screen.  The sound is great too.  I love the Roku but this has definitely delivered incremental opportunities for viewing things on a big screen at a great price.
author: obxbarb

review: If I were Google, I would NOT be in the hardware business. I have tried multiple times to get this thing to work. I have exchanged it at least 3 times.  I have spoken to Google customer support. Do you know what they told me? "The Chromecast device needs to be within 15 to 20 feet of the router". That is quite a restrictive requirement! I would not recommend this product to anyone!
